Heartstopper Information

Smash an enemy's chest to deal damage and possibly reduce inflict Chest Trauma. Type: Action Range: 1.5m

How to unlock Heartstopper

Heartstopper can be performed with Morningstar-Type Weapons.

Heartstopper Tips & Notes

Chest Trauma: Disadvantage on Constitution Saving Throws and lose Action for 2 Turns.
